name: Cook the Book: Braised Shoulder of Lamb
description: Editor's note: Our friend and Serious Eater Cathy, who praised this week's Cook the Book selection on Monday, is back with thoughts on today's recipe, which ends our dance with Beyond Nose to Tail. But it doesn't have to end...
recipeIngredient: 1 shoulder of lamb, on the bone
20 cloves of garlic, peeled and left whole
A bundle of thyme and rosemary

recipeInstructions.text: In an oven tray deep and wide enough to house your shoulder of lamb, brown the shallots and garlic in oil. Lay the bundle of joy in the pan and put the shoulder of lamb on top. Pour on the white wine and stock. Season the shoulder liberally.
